name: relaxant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] (also mainly US relaxer) something that helps you relax: Fishing is a very good relaxant. Most children regard the journey as a relaxant rather than a stressor.
[ C or U ] (also mainly US relaxer) a drug or other substance that makes muscles less tight: Anectine is a muscle relaxant used for putting tubes down patients' throats. Avoid foods that are relaxants - fatty foods, alcohol, chocolate and peppermint - as these loosen the sphincter muscle, resulting in heartburn.
[ C or U ] (also relaxer) a chemical used for straightening curly hair: I inspected the collection of hair relaxants and coconut oil on the bathroom shelf. This bleaching process is exacerbated by any chlorine, hair dye, chemicals and relaxants already on the hair.
